name: Through The Wind
description:
Through the Wind tells a story about a stranger who washes up along Beechton's shoreline, a small community and village that is being overturned by the megacorporation: Konch. 

Through helping the people in the village, our hero uncovers the truth and hopes to resolve the world's issue.

The game is still in development and we will be working on expanding the world and story.
